title: [K-12] Integrated Clinical and Translational Science Curriculum Development: Simulation/VR-Based Information Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Life Science and Research Methodology Knowledge, Basic Digital Literacy Skills
context.additional_context: Integrated curriculum strengthening information search/analysis/application skills in clinical and translational sciences; implements library resource utilization, biomedical informatics basics, and academic communication skills via VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently search for and evaluate relevant information in clinical research literature
Learners can systematically analyze research topics using biomedical databases (e.g., PubMed)
Learners can design and execute team-based research projects in a VR simulation environment while applying academic communication skills

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
